title: Ep292 Autumn Crimes
description:
This week, the gals welcome Steven Ray Morris of The Purrrcast to relish in the pleasures of the season. Topics include a damning MySpace profile, a grisly orchard discovery, and the science behind those gourd-geous fall colors. Mix up some hot apple cider with a shot of Fireball, stay away from Staten Island, and tune in for Autumn Crimes.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
